data.title: Over priced and food is ok
data.text:
We ate here in Nov. 5 2016. Let say it is hard to complain about a free meal as that is what we had from a offer the wife received
 Yet, I feel that something should be said
 It says Steakhouse yet, they have more seafood plates than steak
 We are seated a litle early which was fine andvery quickly  a glass of water was delivered
 Our waitress came by and  left as we wanted a little more time
 I wonder if you getthe same service when a offer is used as you do if you are paying.
 We order a salad to start I just wanted a plain lettuce and tomato. (Thinking iceberg lettuce ) The wife gets a different type. The salad arrives and mine has grapes, some sort of dark stemmed lettuce and a wide leaf type green . There were several large pieces of the base of a lettuce head and large stems .Disappointed 
 I order a T bone with only salt and pepper .No garlic butter ,no seasoning nothing 
 You would think that would gve the hint of just  meat and salt and pepper .Also a baked potato The steak 44.00 the potato is 7.00
 The wife gets a rib eye the same way
  The meal arrives and here is some kindof brown gravy poured on the steaks
  Use to be any time you put something in a steak or ask fro any sort of sauce it was a sign of disrespect to the cook . Guess now it is the norm.
 We expected  apretty bug potato for the pirce and was surprised to see how small it was and the peeling was really hard
  We waited for ever to get dressing for the salad and the 2 nd glass of tea was out of the question. 
 The waitress was really attentive at the start and then quickly tapered off
  We had finished our meal before she ever retunred to see if we needed anything
  I will say she may have been very new at this type of job
  The steak price needs to drop about about 10.00 or more and the poatato needs to drop in price by at least 4.00
  I can't say the food was bad at all it was good just over priced and not to my tatse with the  gravy 
 I would eat here again but not at the prices they charge and now know I have to tell them no gravy

owner_response.author: Anthony C, General Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are glad that you found your food to be good enough to come back for. We are disappointed that our waitress wasn't as attentive as you were expecting. We will forward this review over to our F&B team so they can take a look into it for you. That way your next dinner with us will be the five-star meal you deserve.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: dinner
data.text: the food was good.  I ordered a medium well steak...could have cooked a little longer but I choose not to send it back.  Nice atmosphere

owner_response.author: Stephanie D, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to review your experience with us. We're glad you enjoyed your food, and please feel free to let us know next time if you want it cooked a bit longer! We'd love to give you a perfect experience for your tastes. Hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: No words!!! Simply Amazing food!!!
data.text: If you are looking for a fine dinning experience, this is the place to go!!! Perfect for any special occasion, or just wonderful food!!! The steak and lobster are amazing!!! Perfect for getting engaged or anniversary, or any special occasion!!! The staff and the waitress was wonderful. My steak was cooked to perfection!!!

owner_response.author: Stephanie D, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks so much for the 5-star review! We are so glad your dinner was perfect, and we hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: NOT WHAT WE EXPECTED
data.text: Once a year on our anniversary, we chose a NICE steak house to eat at. After reading mostly good reviews we decided to go to 1800 Prime. This was the worst mistake I made for our anniversary. The drink server had no knowledge of the bar drinks or types of alcohol available, we had to go to the bar ourself to find out about available rums. That was a little inconvenient but not a deal breaker. We sat in a booth, expecting a romantic atmosphere, but the kitchen is close to the seating area, so the LARGE doors were constantly flinging open and close. The booths were really large family seating booths with no personality, just a cheap white cloth. The waitress was not very personal and the food was not up to par for almost $150.00. The food was consistent with the buffet and we probably would have saved a lot of money just going to the buffet. This is NOT up to high end steak house standards. We were so disappointed and will not be returning.

owner_response.author: Stephanie D, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi there, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback, and we've passed your comments along to our 1800 Prime team. In the meantime, could you please email us at socialmedia@boomtownbossier.com with the date of your visit and the best contact information so we can reach out to you directly?
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fabulous Steak and Lobster. Impeccable service by Monica!!!!
data.text: You cannot go wrong with anything on their menu. We never have a bad meal here. My favorite choice is the filet and lobster. All of their side dishes are a winner! Their French onion soup is a GREAT starter. Cocktails are Special!! MONICA is a FABULOUS waiter!

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are thrilled to see your overall experience was great. We look forward to having you as a guest again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Average food, okay service, not worth the price.
data.text:
Our visit was actually on New Year's Eve and we were SO disappointed, from beginning to end.  Waiter was nice, but elusive and never checked on us after serving the food.  Flagged him down to ask for another cocktail, which didn't arrive until after dinner was finished.
Steak and lobster were served luke-warm; steak was poor quality and lobster was okay, but there wasn't enough lobster meat to actually judge it!

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your recent visit and for taking the time to tell us about your experience. We are sorry to see that your experience was less than perfect and did not meet our standards. We would like you email us at socialmedia@boomtownbossier.com with your contact information and additional information about your recent visit. We will make sure this gets passed on to the appropriate management individuals. Thank you so much and we look forward to hearing from you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice
data.text: My husband and I ate here for our one year anniversary.  The staff were all very friendly and attentive.  Our food was excellent.  I had a ribeye and my husband had the ribs.  Everything tasted great.  The chef came by the tables to ensure everyone enjoyed their food. We will return.

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are thrilled to see your overall experience was great. We look forward to having you as a guest again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very Good
data.text: I ate here several years ago with my wife. It was very good. A little pricey but still very good steak and sides.

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are thrilled to see your overall experience was great. We thank you for your comments and we look forward to having you as a guest again soon!

data.title: Celebrated my birthday.
data.text: The chef in this restaurant in Boomtown goes out of his way to ensure an awesome dining experience.  The food is always amazing and the atmosphere is delightful.

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are thrilled to see your overall experience was great. We look forward to having you as a guest again soon!

data.title: Best ribeye I've had from restraunt
data.text:
Wife and I have eatin here twice in July of 15, and everything we had was great! The ribeye was the best. We had bacon wrapped shrimp, blue crab claws and boiled shrimp for appitizers, with the bacon wrapped shrimp our favorite, for entrees we tried ribeye steak, stuffed pork chops, lobster, fried shrimp plate. And everything was cooked to perfection and had zero complaints at all. It is on the expensive side but you get a great meal with great service. About the only nit picky thing was the shoe string fries on the shrimp platters were so thin you couldn't really eat them but the shrimp are so big who cares! I eat a lot and never get a Togo box but I had to with the shrimp plate! 
So if you feel like spoiling yourself or have a special occasion try 1800 I'm sure you will be impressed as we were. Apparently they have a new cook after reading some of the older reviews.

owner_response.author: JustinBpnk, Public Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are thrilled to see your overall experience was great. We appreciate all of the comments and we look forward to having you as a guest again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Family outing
data.text: Throw up food.Really 1800 was my favorite  Steakhouse. I invited family to eat there from bragging. About the food (6/11/15)@7:30. The steak came out burn from the bacon wrap around it. The worst part was the Server said , the Chef said that steak burnt an still served us. I ask her can you take our food back . She replied. No and the Chef just looking at us know what was going on.Guess what we did said thank you no tip and left. I told the lady at the door go look at that dog food she was serving us. The table next to us had the same steak. They food was still red inside the steak .I heard him as for well done.Every food that night was terrible .look like some got all the food out TRASH. BRING IN SOMEONE WHO KNOW HOW TO COOK.I LIKE EATING AT 1800. I NOTICED LIGHTING WAS DARKEN THEN NORMAL.CHEF PLEASE GET SOME TRAINING OR PACK YOUR KNIFES AND CHEF HAT.THUS MY EXPERIENCES OH YEA CAME BACK (6/27\15).STILL TRASH SO I GUESS 1800 WE BE ON A HOLD.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sending us your feedback. We apologize you did not enjoy your experience while dining with us and we would love to discuss it further. Please call our Operational Excellence Manager at 318.841.2169. We hope to hear from you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Anniversary dinner
data.text: Me and my wife went here for our first anniversary dinner.   Great is all I can say.   Service great.   Food great.   The server great.   Looking forward to coming back very soon.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Happy Anniversary!  We love that you chose us to celebrate the your happy occasion with.  Please come again and dine with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great
data.text: Had to try out this steakhouse while staying at Boomtown.  I had the stuffed pork chops and they were excellent. The lamb was awesome also.   The Crab claws were good.  They had a different twist to other crab claws I had. The service was great.  The bartender was our server.  Her name started with a C I believe and she had a afro.  That is what she called it.  Very nice environment and great food.  I did not think the price was that bad, at least for the stuffed pork chops.  I will return on my next visit.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are happy to hear you enjoyed the pork chops and crab claws.  Please come again soon and try some of our other amazing dishes!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The Best
data.text: I am from Chicago but now live in Dallas so I know steak houses. Chef Monday touch tables, something you only see on TV Bar Rescue and he will even whip up something nice for you on special request. The food is up there with The Capital Grill. The atmosphere is awesome and my favorite sever Lee is on point; people stop by to say hi even if they are not eating there that night. I will stick to 1800 Prime Steak House, any other Steak House is just uncivilized...

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad you had a great experience while dining with us.  Lee is one of the best!  Your comments have been given to him.  Thank you for the feedback and we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The worst
data.text: Absolutely the worst meal I have ever had. The steak still had the marks where the jockey was whipping it.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We apologize you did not enjoy your meal while dining with us.  We would love to have you back and make up the experience.  Please feel free to call 318.746.0711 and ask to speak with our Executive Chef.  We hope to hear from you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overpriced place to eat even for a steak
data.text:
I love a good steak and they do serve a nice on. The baked potato is a decent size
 The Chef comes out and checks on you to see if the food is ok ,which I think is a nice gesture. I think he does it for a tip as well.
 I often tip the person that makes my meal if it is as ordered or special ,I don't  do it when someone hints at it and walks you all the way to the door as this chef did hinting every step of the way
 I think paying 40.00 for  what  is supposed to be a 24 oz. T-bone is out of line and 4.00 for a salad or a baked potato or 4 asparagus sprouts is way out of line
 Every thing has a separate price 
 The wife and I ate here it cost us 98.00 plus tip and tax
 For two T-bones ,two baked potatoes, and one asparagus side dish. We both had water
 Something else that is surprising is you have to make reservations. The first time we tried they told  us it would be 4 days from the day we tried.
 We thought Wow!!! these must be good steaks.
 We made another attempt latter and got in quicker, yet the time we were in there we never saw more than 6 or 8 people being waited on. 
 I think they do this to make you think it is better than what it is
  Just way over priced in my book

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are happy you are enjoyed your food at 1800 Prime.  We apologize you felt Chef was looking for a tip, as that was not his intent.  He is an exceptional chef and loves to speak with our guests; often building great relationships with them.  We hope you do come see us again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Worth every penny!
data.text: Great food, phenomenal service! Hands down the ever steakhouse we have ever visited! Staff was friendly, the food was better than expected, and the Christmas decor was flawless!

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are  thrilled you had a great dining experience.  We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Boom Town Best
data.text:
Great tasty Mouth watering tender steak!!!!! You could not have asked for more. The great chef Monday brought our food to our table with a lot of flare and pizzas. The shrimp dish was steaming hot and just well cooked. Oh the dessert ma ma Mia!!
You just have to visit and enjoy the service, decor and food.
Cannot wait to return.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your comments!  Chef Monday has brought so much passion and experience to 1800 Prime.  We hope you visit again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Yummy birthday dinner
data.text: 2nd visit for me ... 1st time was a couple years ago was so good came back.  My parents & I visited on Friday night walked in no reservation no problem. We had spinach dip with cheese toast points for an app. Then delicious fresh salads.  Mom and I had NY strips cooked to perfection.  Dad had chicken alfredo he said was very good. Couple of cold beers. Everything very good.  Service was suberb ... no issues at all.  Chef came out and walked the floor speaking with everyone.   No dessert too full. Total bill about $150.

owner_response.author: ExcellenceMgr, Guest Relations Manager at 1800 Prime Steakhouse, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are thrilled you enjoyed your birthday dinner.  Please come again soon and stay for dessert!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: New manager and new chef "cooks"
data.text: My wife and I always visit this steakhouse, we stay at the hotel attached and really enjoy the food, normally they offer specials for supper (range about $24.00) this has always been great food.  Sometimes I do have to wait a longer period of time when ordering a special cooked steak.  Staff is great!  I suggest you get reservations. New manager Buffy will assist you if any questions.   Enjoy!
